# koroFileHeade

文档头部注释  

- vscode-fileheader  不维护了    

- koroFileHeader  推荐使用

1、在插件搜索koroFileHeade下载

![](IMG/henggao_2020-02-18_19-45-40.png)

2、配置信息

![](IMG/henggao_2020-2-18.gif)

```json
    "fileheader.customMade": {    //此为头部注释
        "Description": "",
        "Version": "1.0",
        "Autor": "Henggao",
        "Date": "Do not edit",
        "LastEditors": "Henggao",
        "LastEditTime": "Do not edit"
    },
    "fileheader.cursorMode": {  //此为函数注释
        "param": "",
        "return": "",
    }
```
